ReportBundle.ReportXML: <Report ReportGID="ee805adc-9761-49b9-82c4-1fc766a87319" ReportUseType="2" ReportType="5" ReportName="Recipe Usage / Cost" Description="Pen Recipe usage with Cost per day" CreatedDT="2012-07-13T10:56:44" ModifiedDT="2014-12-24T09:40:06.07" ModifiedBy="VAS" ConcurrencyTS="AAAAAAAliWU=" ReportVersion="3" />

ReportQuery.ReportQueryText: <QueryBundle> <QueryText>select z.* from ( select ReportDate = fs.InstanceDate ,LocationName = loc.LocationName ,RecipeName = rec.RecipeName ,CompanyName = c.CompanyName ,TransactionDT = DropSum.TransactionDT ,DropAFQty = dbo.GetMeasurementValue(DropSum.DropAF, c.MediumMeasurementType) ,DropAFTons = dbo.GetMeasurementValue(DropSum.DropAF, c.LargeMeasurementType) ,DropDMQty = dbo.GetMeasurementValue(DropSum.DropDM, c.MediumMeasurementType) ,DropDMTons = dbo.GetMeasurementValue(DropSum.DropDM, c.LargeMeasurementType) ,DropCost = DropSum.DropCost ,DropCostPerAFQty = DropSum.DropCost / NULLIF(dbo.GetMeasurementValue(DropSum.DropAF, c.MediumMeasurementType), 0) ,DropCostPerAFTon = DropSum.DropCost / NULLIF(dbo.GetMeasurementValue(DropSum.DropAF, c.LargeMeasurementType), 0) ,DropCostPerDMQty = DropSum.DropCost / NULLIF(dbo.GetMeasurementValue(DropSum.DropDM, c.MediumMeasurementType), 0) ,DropCostPerDMTon = DropSum.DropCost / NULLIF(dbo.GetMeasurementValue(DropSum.DropDM, c.LargeMeasurementType), 0) from ( select fsd.FeedingScheduleDropGID ,fs.FeedingScheduleGID ,RecipeGID = rec.RecipeGID ,TransactionDT = itd.StartDT ,DropAF = SUM(itd.DropIngAF) ,DropDM = SUM(itd.DropIngDM) ,DropCost = SUM(itd.DropIngCost) from FeedingScheduleDrop fsd join FeedingScheduleLoad fsl on fsl.FeedingScheduleLoadGID = fsd.FeedingScheduleLoadGID join FeedingScheduleMix fsm on fsm.FeedingScheduleMixGID = fsl.FeedingScheduleMixGID join FeedingSchedule fs on fs.FeedingScheduleGID = fsm.FeedingScheduleGID join Recipe rec on rec.RecipeGID = ISNULL(fsm.ActualRecipeGID, fsm.PlanRecipeGID) cross apply ( select StartDT = DATEADD(second, -itd.DurationSeconds, itd.TransactionDT) ,StopDT = itd.TransactionDT ,DropIngAF = itd.UnitQuantity ,DropIngDM = itd.UnitQuantity * itd.DMPct ,DropIngCost = itd.FifoCost from InventoryTransaction itd where itd.TransactionSourceGID = fsd.FeedingScheduleDropGID ) itd -- Inventory transactions for the drop. where exists(select 1 from InventoryTransaction it where it.TransactionSourceGID = fsd.FeedingScheduleDropGID) group by fsd.FeedingScheduleDropGID, fs.FeedingScheduleGID, rec.RecipeGID, itd.StartDT ) DropSum join FeedingScheduleDrop fsd on fsd.FeedingScheduleDropGID = DropSum.FeedingScheduleDropGID join FeedingSchedule fs on fs.FeedingScheduleGID = DropSum.FeedingScheduleGID join Recipe rec on rec.RecipeGID = DropSum.RecipeGID join Location loc on loc.LocationGID = fsd.LocationGID join Company c on c.CompanyGID = loc.CompanyGID ) z where 1=1</QueryText> <PreQueryText /> </QueryBundle>
ReportQuery.SQLStatement:
select M.FeedingScheduleMixGID ,M.RecipeName ,D.TransactionDT ,D.LocationName ,D.ReportDate ,SUM(D.AFQty) as 'DropAFQty' ,SUM(D.AFQty * M.UnitCost) as 'DropCost'
from (select fsm.FeedingScheduleMixGID ,fsl.FeedingScheduleLoadGID ,r.RecipeName ,ii.InventoryItemName ,ii.InventoryItemGID ,it.FromLocationGID ,fl.LocationName ,iil.UnitCost ,it.UnitQuantity ,dbo.GetMeasurementValue(it.UnitQuantity, 54) as 'AFQty' ,rownum = ROW_NUMBER() over (partition by ii.InventoryItemGID, it.UnitQuantity order by it.UnitQuantity) from InventoryTransaction it join FeedingScheduleMixInstruction mi on mi.FeedingScheduleMixInstructionGID = it.TransactionSourceGID join FeedingScheduleMix fsm on fsm.FeedingScheduleMixGID = mi.FeedingScheduleMixGID join FeedingScheduleLoad fsl on fsl.FeedingScheduleMixGID = fsm.FeedingScheduleMixGID join Recipe r on r.RecipeGID = fsm.PlanRecipeGID join InventoryItem ii on ii.InventoryItemGID = it.InventoryItemGID join Location fl on fl.LocationGID = it.FromLocationGID join InventoryItemLocation iil on iil.InventoryItemGID = ii.InventoryItemGID and iil.LocationGID = fl.LocationGID ) M
join (select fsd.FeedingScheduleDropGID ,fsd.FeedingScheduleLoadGID ,tl.LocationName ,it.InventoryItemGID ,it.TransactionDT ,ii.InventoryItemName ,CONVERT(datetime, convert(date, it.transactionDT)) as 'ReportDate' ,dbo.GetMeasurementValue(it.UnitQuantity, 54) as 'AFQty' ,rownum = ROW_NUMBER() over (partition by it.InventoryItemGID, it.UnitQuantity order by it.UnitQuantity) from InventoryTransaction it join FeedingScheduleDrop fsd on fsd.FeedingScheduleDropGID = it.TransactionSourceGID join InventoryItem ii on ii.InventoryItemGID = it.InventoryItemGID join Location tl on tl.LocationGID = fsd.LocationGID ) D on D.FeedingScheduleLoadGID = M.FeedingScheduleLoadGID and D.InventoryItemGID = M.InventoryItemGID and D.rownum = M.rownum
where (1=1) group by M.FeedingScheduleMixGID, M.RecipeName, D.ReportDate, D.TransactionDT, D.LocationName
